sentences.english: Happened, the vessel motorboat to save not escape.
sentences.chinese: 刚巧，有艘汽艇经过，拯救尚未逃生者。

sentences.english: Old photographs of the Moscow subway stations, the city of Ufa and a steamboat cruise.
sentences.chinese: 这些是莫斯科地铁站，乌法城以及汽艇的旧照片。

sentences.english: The powerboat picked us up and headed to higher ground.
sentences.chinese: 汽艇带上我们往高地方向驶去。

sentences.english: I first encountered this when fishing on a friend's power boat.
sentences.chinese: 头一回赶上这种事儿是在搭朋友的汽艇钓鱼时。

sentences.english: Tug boats and launches into the territory available.
sentences.chinese: 船只入港可获得拖轮和汽艇。

sentences.english: The powerboat picked us up and headed to higher ground.
sentences.chinese: 汽艇带上我们往高地方向驶往。

sentences.english: Gondolas and motorboats took part in the event along Venice's Grand Canal.
sentences.chinese: 平底船和汽艇参加了在威尼斯大运河沿岸举办的活动。

sentences.english: Scobie went out in the police boat as soon as the liner anchored.
sentences.chinese: 客轮一抛锚，斯考比马上坐着警察局的汽艇迎了出去。

sentences.english: A powerboat was bearing down on us.
The bay where water lilies quietly floated is now a harbor for motor boats.
sentences.chinese: 睡莲静静漂浮的湖湾，现在成了汽艇的避风港。

definition: fishing boat/same as 漁船|渔船
